Class GameElementBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameElementBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameElementCheckers

    public class GameElementBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameElementCheckers
    This GameElementBuilder class provides the methods that are used to build the different elements of the game. This class implements GameElementCheckers and build the specific elements if their definition is valid.
    Author:
    dgoncalves
